articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: 'I'm back': Trump returns to YouTube and Facebook after two-year ban
articles.description: YouTube banned Trump in 2021 for violating its policy against inciting violence after his supporters stormed the U.S. Capitol as Congress was certifying Joe Biden's victory in the 2020 presidential election. Opponents of Trump's return point to his messages on Truth Social, where he has nearly 5 million followers, as evidence that he still poses the same risk that led to his suspensions.
articles.content:
